title: Serif font for Skyrim?
content:
Hey everyone! Long time no see. :)

I'm looking for the font that says "Dawnguard" in this photo. I thought it was Trajan but the W's don't match. Any ideas?

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011080658im_/http:/typophile.com/files/skyrim-dawnguard_5189.jpg)
author: drk

comments.content: It's definitely a Garamond, I think [Garamond Premier Pro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011080658/http:/myfonts.us/td-QlLvHQ).
